A value of [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/MaterialParameterTypes/TriangleFillMode/fill] causes RealityKit to draw triangles normally, while a value of  [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/MaterialParameterTypes/TriangleFillMode/lines] turns on wireframe rendering.

# triangleFillMode

**Instance Property**

The object that controls how RealityKit draws triangles.

## Declaration

```swift
var triangleFillMode: PortalMaterial.TriangleFillMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

A value of [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/MaterialParameterTypes/TriangleFillMode/fill] causes RealityKit to draw triangles normally, while a value of  [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/MaterialParameterTypes/TriangleFillMode/lines] turns on wireframe rendering.
title: triangleFillMode
